metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000161 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: nmap version 6.49BETA6 through 7.60, up to and including SVN revision 37147contains a Directory Traversal vulnerability in NSE script http-fetch thatcan result in file overwrite as the user is running it. This attack appearsto be exploitable via a victim that runs NSE script http-fetch against amalicious web site. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 7.7.

criterions.comment: nmap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
